report.title: Charles II, 1664 & 1665
report.subtitle: Chapter VII. An A&bholigct; for continuance of a former A&bholigct; for regulateing the Presse.[Rot. Parl. 16 & 17 C. II. nu. 6.]

section.head: 14 (13 & 14) Car. II. c. 33. continued.
section.para: Bee it ena&bholigct;ed by the Kings most Excellent Majestie by and with the Advice and Consent of the Lords Spirituall and Temporall and Commons in this present Parlyament assembled That an A&bholigct; made in the Fowerteenth yeare of the Raigne of our Soveraigne Lord the King that now is entituled An A&bholigct; for preventing Abuses in printing seditious treasonable, and unlicensed Bookes and Pamphlets and for regulateing of Printing and Printing-Presses shall be continued and remaine in force untill the end of the next Session of Parlyament.
